captions.text:
-Hello, my name is Rickie Hollins.
-And my name is Elizabeth Hollins.
Welcome to our cab.

-We need one more.
-I know, 'cause I looked at him.

We've been doing this
for 13 years now as a team.

I don't think I could or would
want to drive without her.

Because that's my bud, that's
my partner. That's my right hand.

-He wants us back on the 21st?
-I told him the 21st 'cause that's...
And where I fail, she's right there.

And where I'm slacking,
she picks up the slack.

First two, three years
it was a power struggle.

"Who's the boss?" "It's me."
Yeah, the first one.

That's because
we were arguing about space.
Storage. Storage. Storage up here.

We've got storage.
Right here we've got more storage.

-I have a drawer.
-She has two drawers.

I'm going to give you
a tour of my big baby.
Up here we have DVD storage.
And here we have our DVD.
The TV that's HD.

We have refrigerator, freezer,
which is packed full of goodies.

Here we have a microwave,
conventional oven.

This is our bathroom.
This is the shower and the bathroom.

You just punch it and...
We have a full size bed.

In the summer or spring,
you can actually open the door.
You have a full door.
I guess that's basically our home.

-What are you making?
-Soup. You want some soup?

-And what? Just soup?
-Soup and crackers.
I guess that will be good.

I love to laugh and have fun,
so I watch a lot of comedies.

And we have that 32 inch screen TV,
which is nice. Guys, look at it!

It is nice and Perry Mason comes
across great in his black and white.
Thank you, sweetheart.

Just being able to lay back
and have the comforts of home-

-being out on the road
as long as we do it, is awesome.

I think the best thing for any woman
is the shower and the toilet.

One, two o'clock in the morning when
you have to go - you've got to go!

title: Volvo Trucks - Meet the Hollins - "Welcome to my cab"
